name: legal-calculator
description: Property Transfer Cost Calculator for Namibia - AWS SAM Application

scripts.invalidate:sandbox: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name legal-calculator-sandbox --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`StaticDistributionId`].OutputValue' --output text) --paths '/*'
scripts.invalidate:live: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name legal-calculator-live --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`StaticDistributionId`].OutputValue' --output text) --paths '/*'
